title: Fake Rabby Wallet App drains users’ funds despite reports to Apple
description: A fraudulent version of the Rabby Wallet app has caused distress among users of the Apple App Store, with several individuals reporting significant financial losses.  Despite multiple complaints and alerts, the malicious app remains available for download, highlighting concerns regarding Apple’s app vetting process. Users Sound Alarm Over Fake Rabby Wallet App The imposter app, […]

title: FTX and Alameda sued over Tether profit scheme
description: FTX Trading Ltd. and its affiliate Alameda Research are at the center of a lawsuit alleging involvement in a complex scheme to generate profits by creating and selling Tether (USDT) stablecoins. The case, filed in a Florida federal court on February 16, accuses the cryptocurrency trading platform and its sister firm of leveraging an unofficial […]

title: Backpack exchange partners with Banxa to enhance crypto on-ramp solution
description: Backpack Exchange, the brainchild of the creators behind Solana’s Mad Lads NFT collection, has recently forged a significant partnership with Banxa, a global crypto on-ramp provider.  This collaboration aims to revolutionize digital asset transactions by offering users a seamless on- and off-ramp solution. With Banxa’s expertise, Backpack users in more than 130 countries can now […]

title: Worldcoin’s WLD Token Rockets 141% with 1M Daily Users Milestone
description: Worldcoin’s native token surged over 140% as its user base surpassed one million, driven by its goal to introduce Universal Basic Income through iris scans. Despite privacy concerns leading to regulatory scrutiny in several countries, the token’s value continues to rise, buoyed by a broader crypto market rally. title: Neon EVM and deBridge Enable Solana-EVM Native Swaps; Bright Prospects for Arbitrum & Low Cap AI Gem
description: The drive to knit together different blockchain networks and smooth out user experiences has sparked some truly exciting partnerships and breakthroughs in the blockchain world. title: Bitcoin’s Fate Hangs in Balance: Will it Surge to $65,000 or Plunge to $41,000? Expert Analysis Reveals
description: An analyst predicts that Bitcoin is set to hit $65k, however, the asset could fall considerably when bears reject the move.  Another analyst predicts that Bitcoin could pull back to $46k as it looks very vulnerable at the $52,000 and $53,800 price range. Bitcoin (BTC) extends its explosive run as it retests the $52,428.53 price [...]

title: Ethiopia Embraces Bitcoin: $250 Million Mining Project Sparks Global Interest
description: Ethiopia gears up to kickstart its $250 million data mining project. Following the approval of mining activities, Ethiopia is spearheading Bitcoin mining on a continental scale. The Ethiopian government is opening its arms to cryptocurrency mining as it attempts to keep up with the rising adoption of digital currencies on a global scale. The North-Eastern [...]

title: Will Stablecoins Be the Trojan Horse for Crypto’s Mass Adoption?
description:
While the recovery process in the Bitcoin market continues, a post shared by former NFL player Russell Okung sparked debates in the cryptocurrency market.
